issue.title: Old sdformat-sdf debs are not archived

content.raw:
Good point, I forgot to look in the S3 container.

It's true that the new `sdformat-sdf` package works with old versions, but it works differently, so the question was how to get reproducible behavior. It is still possible with `dpkg -i` after downloading an old version. I'll mark this as resolved since they are archived on s3.

Thanks!
content.html:
Good point, I forgot to look in the S3 container.

It's true that the new sdformat-sdf package works with old versions, but it works differently, so the question was how to get reproducible behavior. It is still possible with dpkg -i after downloading an old version. I'll mark this as resolved since they are archived on s3.

Thanks!
